template.description: Create a fucntion that returns a table.
template.name: createfntb

templates.template: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION FN_${fn_name}() RETURNS TABLE( ${att} int) AS $$BODY$$ BEGIN RETURN QUERY SELECT * FROM ${tabla} END; $$BODY$$ LANGUAGE 'plpgsql';

template.description: Alter table add foreign key with referential action and match.

template.description: Raise notice with current line number.
template.name: raisen

templates.template: raise notice 'despues de ${ant_inst}';
select ${col:column(table)},count(*) from ${table} t group by ${col};
select count(*) from ${table};
select * from ${table};
select * from ${table} t order by ${column};
select * from ${table} where ${column}='${value}';
